items.title: How can I tell if a site has MIMO?

pageContext.excerpt: Introduction MIMO (multiple input, multiple output) is a way of increasing the throughput of a data connection by broadcasting and receivingâ€¦

frontmatter.title: LTE MIMO: streams, ranks, multipath propagation and more
frontmatter.description: MIMO is one of LTE's most important features. It allows eNodeBs to transmit more than one stream of data at the same time to double, triple, quadruple (or more!) data throughput.
